ValidationRule.description: This validation rule is to stop Sales Reps from creating work order opportunities
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: And( $User.Id != '0051a000002JKtR', ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Work Order'), NOT($Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "Finance")), NOT($Profile.Name = "Order Operations Admin") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If you need to create a 'Work Order' Opportunity contact salesops@samsara.com
